results.definition: something added to what you already have
examples: he was a new addition to the staff

results.definition: a component that is added to something to improve it
examples: the addition of a bathroom was a major improvement
the addition of cinnamon improved the flavor
there was an addition to property taxes this year

results.definition: the arithmetic operation of summing; calculating the sum of two or more numbers
a suburban area laid out in streets and lots for a future residential area
the act of adding one thing to another
examples: the addition of flowers created a pleasing effect
the addition of a leap day every four years
